climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【MATERIAL】 The pillow cover is made of 100% PE mocrofiber cooling material. The filling is composed of a blue color layer of high resilience memory foam with a height of 1.26" and a gray color normal resilience memory foam with a height of 3.74". It is well adapted to people with different sleep requirements.

【FEATURES】 GTCOOCUREPTL The Arc-chill cooling fiber pillow cover can provide a incredible long-lasting cooling feel. Sleep with the blue layer up/ gray layer down will be more soft. Blue layer have slower resilience than the gray layer. If you choose to sleep with the gray layer up/ blue layer down, the softness of the pillow is normal. People with different sleep needs can choose which side to sleep according to their needs.

【BENIFITS】 5" thickness memory foam is perfect for most side sleepers supportive and soft enough. The memory foam has super resilience, and it can still rebound as before after tens of thousands of presses in time. It is shown that side sleeping helps with circulation, breathing and digestion. At the same time, it has accessibility of anti-snoring and anti acid refluxing.

【OCCASIONS】You can use it in bedroom, living room for daily life needs. It will also be your best choice when camping, outdoor, hiking and traveling. The cooling material is quite comfortable for hot sleepers to use in so many occasions.

【CARE INSTRUCTIONS】 When you need to clean the pillow, please take off the pillow cover. The pillow cover is machine washable in cold water. Do not iron. Tumble dry in low temperature. As for the memory foam insert, just put it in a ventilated place for a few minutes. Due to the transportation, if there is a smell when you receive the pillow, it will be better to leave it for 5-7 days before using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Side sleeper's dream. Great shape, good firmness, not cooling.
reviews.reviewText: The shape of this pillow has truly improved my sleep. I'm mostly a side sleeper, and occasionally back. Two things about this pillow made sleeping much more comfortable:1) Neck gap is supported. I used to always need to put my arms under my pillow to feel supported enough. This was extremely uncomfortable. I'd wake up with my arms numb and my neck hurting anyway. Now, I never feel like I have to support the pillow with my arms.2) Perfect height. Using this pillow makes me realize that most pillows are wayyy too high. I think it's related to the issue above, where we feel like we need taller pillows (or multiple ones) so that our neck is supported. Really, you just need the right support. This pillow gives me that and my spine and neck feel properly aligned. I actually notice that I wake up with much less stiffness than before, and don't have "cracks" when moving my neck and back after waking up like I did before.I feel like I've been wandering for a great pillow most of my adult life, and I think this is it. For this price, it's absolutely, 100% worth it. A couple things to keep in mind:- The pillow is not cooling. It's memory foam, which can never be cooling. It can feel cool when you first lay on it (like a lot of pillows), but it will absorb your body heat to a degree.- As noted in the post, each side is a different firmness, which is noticeable when you lay on it. It seems to have maintained its firmness so far after a couple of months, but this is something I'll keep an eye on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good pillow, I have terrible sleep posture :(
reviews.reviewText: I've been having some neck and shoulder pain when I get up in the morning and admittedly so I have really bad sleep posture. I'm a side sleeper but I tend to scrunch my shoulder up to my neck and I'm just a mess so that seems to be catching up to me. I tried a different side sleeper pillow before this and it just wasn't working. I heard about square/cube pillows which I thought would be better for my neck and this one had great reviews and an acceptable price. A few things I noticed right off the bat was the quality which was better than I was expecting. It was compressed in the box and after opening the film on the outside it went to it's normal size pretty quickly though I gave it some time to fully decompress. It didn't have any strong/weird smell and the cover seems to be made well and nice and soft. One side was soft and the other more firm which was true to how it's advertised. I prefer the firmer side but sometimes I do switch it up in the middle of the night. I find it to be fairly cooling, doesn't run hot at all. For the final and most important comment it does help me with my neck and shoulder pain. I'm not fully cured just yet :) but it has definitely made an improvement. I'd recommend it to anyone needing that support and proper alignment of your neck and anyone having shoulder pain from side sleeping to give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good side sleeping pillow
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is nice for side sleeping. I only wish I had gotten the 5 inch instead of the 4 inch, it isn't quite as tall as I'd like. I feel like my head isnt fully supported hy the height and my neck kinda bends slightly. And you really are not able to use another pillow on top of this one, as it will slip and slide all over the place for some reason. For reference, I am a 5 foot 4 and 215lbs woman. One side is definitely more firm than the other, which is nice, I prefer the firmer side. I would recommend this, but I would probably err on the side of getting the 5inch height if you're on the fence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're a side sleeper, this is your pillow!
reviews.reviewText: If you're a side sleeper, this is your pillow. Especially if you don't want to pay way more than $100 for other nationally advertised brands. I didn't even know cube pillows existed until I saw the nationally advertised one in an ad. But, I balked at buying one when I saw the pillow was almost $140.$100+ dollars for a pillow? Come on!So, I searched around and found this one on Amazon. I purchased this several months ago, and it is still in great shape and holding strong. It provides great support for my head without having to constantly reposition the pillow under my head. You side sleepers will know what I'm talking about.The only downsides I see are it's not a "Cool" pillow. At least for me. And, your regular pillow cases aren't going to fit it well. They slide off as you sleep. But, I'm not concerned about that at all.Bottom line: buy this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing about this pillow that keeps cool. Due to the material it’s made from there is no way for it to retain any kind of coolness and keep you from getting hot. Very disappointed. However, it is very comfortable and supports my neck well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This memory foam pillow is comfortable, cooling, and an adequate replacement for your old pillows. It comes flattened and rolled up inside nice packaging. Once you remove the pillow from the packageing it retakes its original shape relatively quickly. The instructions say to let the pillow re-form for 48 hours. After 48 hours, I began using my pillows. They provide cool comfort and support. If you're looking for a pillow that will help align your spine as you sleep on your side, this pillow should be considered. It's firm enough to offer support, but soft enough to be comfortable. It is very comfortable if you're a back sleeper as well. It comes in a 4, 5, or 6" thickness. Choose the thickness based on the measurement from your neck to shoulder, if youre a side sleeper. Sleep Well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for side sleeper
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable to use for primary side sleeper. Was having numbness and pain in shoulder due to side sleeping, went through several pillows designed for side sleeper "the weird shaped" ones but they did not help. This rectangular pillow seems to keep my head higher and reduced the weight on my shoulder. It does not completely resolve issue but it helps for a longer duration.
